description: Mikes's Mobile Screen and Chimney Service is Yuba City’s premier chimney and screen company! We can ensure your fireplace is safe to burn in, so you can get back to warm cozy fires. We can also help you sleep safe at night with our Security Screen, protect your windows and your doors!

reviews.name: Mark B.
reviews.content: Juan and Josh were two very knowledgeable, tidy, professional, and courteous technicians I have had pleasure to have complete work at my house. Answered every question I had. Put ample amount of time with each item. Thank you!

reviews.name: David C.
reviews.content: Awesome work. A+ service! Came out to fix some window screens and I also ended up ordering a security screen door. Very pleased with the products and service! The girls on the phone were friendly and accomodating with my schedule and their worker was very nice and cleaned up after himself. I love m…

reviews.name: Jim M.
reviews.content: Mike delivers high quality custom security screen doors with a custom fit and look. He also provided us with retractable screens that allows us to take advantage of the delta breeze. Mike and his installer deliver a quality product with exceptional customer focused service. I highly recommend givin…

cards.title: Inspections
cards.text: Mike's Mobile offers the best same day digital inspection reports. A level 1 inspection comes free with every chimney sweep.

cards.title: Cleaning
cards.text: Maintain the health of your fireplace and chimney annually. According to the NFPA, chimney sweeps should be performed after each cord of wood or annually. We include a free level 1 inspection with all of our chimney cleanings.

cards.title: Repairs
cards.text: Call Mike’s Mobile for Chimney Sweep services today! We are a full service chimney company in the greater Sacramento area and Yuba City. From minor repairs to full rebuilds, we have you covered.
